pullRequest.title: launcher
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Karim TAAM karim.t2am@gmail.com


PR description
This PR adds a launcher to easily configure your client on the mainnet.
You need to start besu with the --Xlauncher flag. Besu will ask questions and will generate a config file. If we restart with this flag and a config file already exists besu will not ask question.
If there is a config file and you want to force the launcher to ask question you need to start besu with --Xlauncher-force flag or remove the config file
We are created a library for that https://github.com/ConsenSys/quorum-mainnet-launcher
With this dependencies https://github.com/ConsenSys/quorum-mainnet-launcher/blob/098df40acd7f7fb773f887f6096021312f97a08d/build.gradle#L93
Sample
? Which Ethereum network would you like to use ?
❯ mainnet
  rinkeby
  ropsten
  goerli
  dev
  classic
  kotti
  mordor
  yolo_v2

You can have more information with --Xhelp flag
Unstable options for Launcher
      --Xlauncher[=<isLauncherMode>]
         Activate the launcher if no configuration file is present.  (default:
           false)
      --Xlauncher-force[=<isLauncherModeForced>]
         Force to activate the launcher even if a configuration file is
           present.  (default: false)

Fixed Issue(s)


Changelog

 I thought about the changelog and included a changelog update if required.

nodes.bodyText: Is there a case where we don't want this enabled?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,102 @@
+[
+    {
+      "prompt-type" :"LIST",
+      "question":"Which ethereum network would you like to use ?",
+      "config-key": "network",
+      "available-options" : "org.hyperledger.besu.cli.config.NetworkName",
+      "additional-flag" : {
+        "yolo_v2": "Xberlin-enabled"
+      }
+    },
+    {
+      "prompt-type" :"LIST",
+      "question":"Which synchronization mode?",
+      "config-key": "sync-mode",
+      "available-options" : "org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.SyncMode"
+    },
+    {
+      "prompt-type": "CONFIRM",
+      "question": "Do you want to enable pruning?",
+      "config-key": "pruning-enabled",
+      "default-option": "no"
+    },
+    {
+      "prompt-type" :"INPUT",
+      "question":"What is the data directory ?",
+      "config-key" : "data-path"
+    },
+    {
+        "prompt-type" :"CONFIRM",
+        "question":"Do you want to enable the JSON-RPC HTTP service ?",
+        "config-key" : "rpc-http-enabled",
+        "default-option" : "yes",
+        "sub-questions" : [
+               {
+                 "prompt-type" :"CONFIRM",
+                 "question":"Do you want to configure the JSON-RPC options now ?",
+                 "default-option" : "yes",
+                 "sub-questions" : [
+                       {
+                          "prompt-type" :"INPUT",
+                          "question":"What is the JSON RPC HTTP host address ?",
+                          "config-key" : "rpc-http-host"
+                        },
+                        {
+                          "prompt-type" :"INPUT",
+                          "question":"What is the JSON RPC HTTP port ?",
+                          "config-key" : "rpc-http-port"
+                        },
+                        {
+                          "prompt-type" :"CHECKBOX",
+                          "question":"Select the list of APIs to enable on JSON-RPC HTTP service",
+                          "config-key": "rpc-http-apis",
+                          "available-options" : "org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.api.jsonrpc.RpcApis$ALL_JSON_RPC_APIS"
+                        }
+                   ]
+               }
+            ]
+     } ,
+     {
+        "prompt-type" :"CONFIRM",
+        "question":"Do you want to enable P2P functionality ?",
